metadata.title: CVE-2020-6581 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Nagios NRPE 3.2.1 has Insufficient Filtering because, for example,nasty_metachars interprets \n as the character \ and the character n (notas the \n newline sequence). This can cause command injection.

criterions.comment: nagios-nrpe package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
